results.title: Metformin Treatment in PCOS Pregnancies Reduces Maternal Infections and Increases the Risk of Allergies and Eczema in the Offspring: Post Hoc Analyses of Two Randomised Controlled Trials and One Follow-Up Study.
results.text_hl: Offspring exposed to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in utero had a higher incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergies@@@ (OR = 4.83, 95% CI: 1.47-21.8) and @DISEASE_Eczema @DISEASE_MESH:D004485 @@@eczema@@@ (OR = 2.42, 95% CI: 1.14-5.33).

citations.NLM: Ryssdal M, Skage JE, Jarmund AH, Hanem LGE, Løvvik TS, Giskeødegård GF, Iversen AC, Vanky E. Metformin Treatment in PCOS Pregnancies Reduces Maternal Infections and Increases the Risk of Allergies and Eczema in the Offspring: Post Hoc Analyses of Two Randomised Controlled Trials and One Follow-Up Study. BJOG. 2025 Aug 11;():. PMID: 40785326

results.title: Effect of Metformin on Epidermal Neural Crest Stem Cells and Their Potential Application in Ameliorating Paclitaxel-induced Neurotoxicity Phenotype.
results.text_hl: Further, it was observed that intranasal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated EPI-NCSCs improved the @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@mechanical and thermal hypersensitivity@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Paclitaxel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017239 @@@paclitaxel@@@ in rats.

citations.NLM: Khodabakhsh P, Asgari Taei A, Shafaroodi H, Pournajaf S, Dargahi L. Effect of Metformin on Epidermal Neural Crest Stem Cells and Their Potential Application in Ameliorating Paclitaxel-induced Neurotoxicity Phenotype. Stem Cell Rev Rep. 2023 Nov 4;():. PMID: 37924435

results.title: Simple and rapid quantification of cetirizine, venlafaxine, and O-desmethylvenlafaxine in human breast milk, and metformin in human milk and plasma with UHPLC-MS/MS.
results.journal: J Chromatogr B Analyt Technol Biomed Life Sci
results.text_hl: Complications such as @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergies@@@, @DISEASE_Depression_Postpartum @DISEASE_MESH:D019052 @@@postpartum depression@@@, and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ are often treated with drugs such as @CHEMICAL_Cetirizine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017332 @@@cetirizine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Venlafaxine_Hydrochloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069470 @@@venlafaxine@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Wegler C, Saleh A, Lindqvist A, Nordeng H, Smeraglia J, Baranczewski P. Simple and rapid quantification of cetirizine, venlafaxine, and O-desmethylvenlafaxine in human breast milk, and metformin in human milk and plasma with UHPLC-MS/MS. J Chromatogr B Analyt Technol Biomed Life Sci. 2022 Aug 1;1205():123340. PMID: 35732105

results.title: Metformin Relieves Bortezomib-Induced Neuropathic Pain by Regulating AMPKa2-Mediated Autophagy in the Spinal Dorsal Horn.
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may regulate @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPKa2@@@-mediated autophagy in the dorsal horn and alleviate the behavioral @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@hypersensitivity@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Bortezomib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069286 @@@BTZ@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu M, Zhao YT, Lv YY, Xu T, Li D, Xiong YC, Xin WJ, Lin SY. Metformin Relieves Bortezomib-Induced Neuropathic Pain by Regulating AMPKa2-Mediated Autophagy in the Spinal Dorsal Horn. Neurochem Res. 2022 Jul;47(7):1878-1887. PMID: 35278160

results.title: Hyperactive Akt-mTOR pathway as a therapeutic target for pain hypersensitivity in Cntnap2-deficient mice.
results.text_hl: We further indicated that treatment with the FDA-approved drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ normalized the hyperactive @GENE_AKT1 @GENE_11651 @@@Akt@@@-@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@ signaling, and attenuated @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@hypersensitivity@@@ in @GENE_CNTNAP2 @GENE_66797 @@@Cntnap2@@@-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Xing X, Wu K, Dong Y, Zhou Y, Zhang J, Jiang F, Hu WP, Li JD. Hyperactive Akt-mTOR pathway as a therapeutic target for pain hypersensitivity in Cntnap2-deficient mice. Neuropharmacology. 2020 Mar 15;165():107816. PMID: 31874168

results.title: Metformin accumulation without hyperlactataemia and metformin-induced hyperlactataemia without metformin accumulation.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: These clinical data suggest a new concept for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy: there may be either resistance or, conversely, @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@hypersensitivity@@@ to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ effects on @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ generation according to the individual @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@.

citations.NLM: Lalau JD, Azzoug ML, Kajbaf F, Briet C, Desailloud R. Metformin accumulation without hyperlactataemia and metformin-induced hyperlactataemia without metformin accumulation. Diabetes Metab. 2014 Jun;40(3):220-3. PMID: 24417956
